attributes.action: Free Jaggi Singh Johal from India who is a British citizen. He needs his freedom
attributes.background: This Sikh man has been obtained by the Indian police whilst he was on holiday. He needs his freedom and needs to come back to the UK. Please help raise our voices for our Sikh Freedom in India.

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament could do.

You could start a new petition urging the UK Government to raise this case with the government of India, if that's what you would like to happen.
